definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[נור]] (√ of foll.; cf. NH [[נוּר]], flame, fire Targum id.; Ar. nwr, na0ra give light, shine, I. (Kam Frey), IV. Lane:2864, na0run; fire, nuwrun light; Syr.nuwr fire; also in n. pr. Palm. Pun. v. Lzb:322 Cook:81; Min. [[מנורת]] torches (?) Hom:Südar. Chrest.128; As.tinûru, furnace, oven (Dl:HWB 711) belongs here acc. to Jäger:BAS ii.294).
